events.name: China's Lithium Import Increase
events.wd_description: China imported 11590.045 tons of lithium carbonate in February 2024, a 22.49% increase from the same period last year.
events.description: China imported 11590.045 tons of lithium carbonate in February 2024, a 22.49% increase from the same period last year.

events.name: New Energy Vehicle (NEV) Demand Recovery
events.wd_description: The demand for NEVs has recovered, leading to an increase in the demand for lithium carbonate.
events.description: The demand for NEVs has recovered, leading to an increase in the demand for lithium carbonate.

events.name: Lithium Carbonate Production Increase
events.wd_description: The production of lithium carbonate has increased due to the recovered demand for NEVs.
events.description: The production of lithium carbonate has increased due to the recovered demand for NEVs.

events.name: China's Lithium Export Decrease
events.wd_description: China exported less lithium carbonate in February 2024 compared to the same period last year, leading to an increase in demand for domestic supply.
events.description: China exported less lithium carbonate in February 2024 compared to the same period last year, leading to an increase in demand for domestic supply.

events.name: Global Lithium Carbonate Market Situation
events.wd_description: The global lithium carbonate market situation has changed due to the decrease in China's lithium export and the increase in demand for domestic supply.
events.description: The global lithium carbonate market situation has changed due to the decrease in China's lithium export and the increase in demand for domestic supply.

events.name: Impact on Lithium Carbonate Prices
events.wd_description: The changed global market situation has led to an impact on lithium carbonate prices, making them more competitive in the domestic market.
events.description: The changed global market situation has led to an impact on lithium carbonate prices, making them more competitive in the domestic market.

events.name: Domestic Lithium Carbonate Supply Meeting Demand
events.wd_label: Domestic Lithium Carbonate Supply Meeting Demand
events.wd_description: The increased demand for lithium carbonate has been met by the domestic supply, making it more competitive in the market.
events.description: The increased demand for lithium carbonate has been met by the domestic supply, making it more competitive in the market.

events.name: Outlook for Lithium Carbonate Industry
events.wd_description: The outlook for the lithium carbonate industry is expected to be positive due to the increasing demand for NEVs.
events.description: The outlook for the lithium carbonate industry is expected to be positive due to the increasing demand for NEVs.

events.name: Impact on China's Lithium Carbonate Industry
events.wd_label: Impact on China's Lithium Carbonate Industry
events.wd_description: The increased demand for lithium carbonate has had a positive impact on China's lithium carbonate industry.
events.description: The increased demand for lithium carbonate has had a positive impact on China's lithium carbonate industry.

events.name: International Cooperation in Lithium Carbonate Industry
events.wd_label: International Cooperation in Lithium Carbonate Industry
events.wd_description: International cooperation is expected to play an important role in the development of the lithium carbonate industry.
events.description: International cooperation is expected to play an important role in the development of the lithium carbonate industry.

events.name: Cobalt sulfate market trends
events.wd_description: The market for cobalt sulfate shows rising prices due to raw material price supports and cautious market attitudes, despite slow demand recovery.
events.description: The market for cobalt sulfate shows rising prices due to raw material price supports and cautious market attitudes, despite slow demand recovery.

events.name: Market attitudes
events.wd_description: Cobalt salt raw material suppliers are maintaining high prices, supporting the mindset of smelters.
events.description: Cobalt salt raw material suppliers are maintaining high prices, supporting the mindset of smelters.

events.name: Demand recovery
events.wd_description: The recovery of demand in the power market is slow, leading to cautious operations and resistance to high prices.
events.description: The recovery of demand in the power market is slow, leading to cautious operations and resistance to high prices.
